value:
Red Beast. Physical weapon. Range: 1.
Damage reduced by target's Def.

Blue Beast. Physical weapon. Range: 1.
Damage reduced by target's Def.

Green Beast. Physical weapon. Range: 1.
Damage reduced by target's Def.

Colorless Beast. Physical weapon. Range: 1.
Damage reduced by target's Def.

A famous delicacy from a Hoshidan
hot spring. Doughy and filled with
bean jam, and best served with tea.

When preparing to bathe in a hot
spring, etiquette dictates washing
with this bucket first. Don't splash!

A feathered protector bestowed by
Tibarn. It's made from the same sort
of feathers as his necklace.

A feathered protector bestowed by
Tibarn. The feathers are his and
those of his companions.

A circlet bestowed by Reyson.
Elegant and intricate, it gives off
an air of refinement.

key: MDAID_白の王子の頭飾り・極
MDAID_H_白の王子の頭飾り・極
value:
A headband bestowed by Reyson.
Elegant and intricate, it gives off an
air of refinement and seems fragile.

A hairpin bestowed by Leanne. It's
made of nuts and flowers, which are
edible, apparently.

A hairpin bestowed by Leanne. Be
careful with it—it looks fragile.

An eyepatch bestowed by Nailah. The
fabric is exquisite and conveys to
its wearer an air of intrigue.

An eyepatch bestowed by Nailah. The
fabric is exquisite and conveys to
its wearer unquestionable charisma.
Defeat a foe with Marth: Altean Prince.
Defeat a foe with Roy: Young Lion.

Defeat an enemy that is level 20 or higher with
Marth: Altean Prince.

Defeat an enemy that is level 20 or higher with
Roy: Young Lion.

Defeat an enemy that is level 20 or higher with
Chrom: Exalted Prince.

Defeat an enemy that is level 35 or higher with
Marth: Altean Prince.

Defeat an enemy that is level 35 or higher with
Roy: Young Lion.

Defeat an enemy that is level 35 or higher with
Chrom: Exalted Prince.
Clear the second stratum of the Training Tower.
Clear the eighth stratum of the Training Tower.
Win Arena Duels on any difficulty.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Leo &
Elise with Sharena: Princess of Askr on your
team.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Leo &
Elise on Lunatic or higher difficulty with
Fjorm: Princess of Ice on your team.

Defeat Leo: Sorcerous Prince at level 40
or higher with Sharena: Princess of Askr.

Defeat Elise: Budding Flower at level 40
or higher with Fjorm: Princess of Ice.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Leo &
Elise on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
an all-flying team.

Clear Book III, Chapter 3: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. All
four allies must survive.

Clear Book III, Chapter 3: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. All
four allies must survive.

Clear Book III, Chapter 3: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. All
four allies must survive.

Clear Book III, Chapter 3: Part 4 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. All
four allies must survive.

Clear Book III, Chapter 3: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. All
four allies must survive.

Defeat the boss Peri on Floors 16-20 on
Normal difficulty in Tap Battle.
Clear a stage in Tap Battle.

Defeat the boss Peri on Floors 16-20 on
Hard difficulty in Tap Battle.
Clear a stage in Tap Battle.

Defeat the boss Elise on Floors 36-40 on
Normal difficulty in Tap Battle.
Clear a stage in Tap Battle.

Defeat the boss Elise on Floors 36-40 on
Hard difficulty in Tap Battle.
Clear a stage in Tap Battle.
Clear a boss stage in Tap Battle.
Clear a boss stage in Tap Battle.
Clear a stage in Tap Battle.

Clear Extra Stage 1 in Tap Battle. (Extra Stage
1 is playable after the Extra Stages unlock.)

Sovereign of Hel, the realm of the dead. Her
power increases as the ranks of the dead grow.
She aims for all the living to enter her realm.

Princess of Serenes. Reyson's younger sister.
She speaks the ancient tongue and has not yet
mastered the language of Tellius. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

King of Kilvas and leader of the raven clan. He
uses his cunning as a weapon and won't shy
away from dirtying his hands. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

Queen of Hatari, a desert nation spoken of
mostly in legend. Her eye patch conceals an
evil eye. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

Prince of Serenes, the former kingdom of the
heron laguz. Brother of Leanne. Frail, but strong
willed. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

King of Phoenicis, the nation of the hawk
laguz. Leads his people by dint of his
overwhelming fighting ability and charisma.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's
attack triggers Special, grants Special
cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage
when Special triggers.

In combat against a dragon foe, disables foe's
skills that "calculate damage using the lower of
foe's Def or Res" and unit can counterattack
regardless of foe's range.

At start of combat, if unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+3,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe does not use magic or staff, calculates
damage using foe's Res, and if unit’s HP > 1
and foe would reduce unit’s HP to 0, unit
survives with 1 HP. (Once per combat. Does not
stack.)

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Spd by
number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum
bonus of +6 to each stat.) At start of turn, if
unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or
if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms
(otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms,
grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when
Special triggers.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.) If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.) If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.) If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2.

Grants Atk+3. If foe's HP = 100% and if unit
initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack. At start of turn, if unit is
adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit
is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms
(otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, unit
can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does
not stack.) If unit transforms, grants Atk+2.

Grants Spd+3. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, deals
damage = 70% of difference between stats.
(Maximum bonus of +7 damage. Combos with
Phantom Spd.) At start of turn, if unit is
adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit
is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms
(otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, unit
can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does
not stack.) If unit transforms, grants Atk+2.

Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, restores 7 HP
to allies within 2 spaces of unit. At start of turn,
if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies
or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, unit can move 1 extra space. (That
turn only. Does not stack.) If unit transforms,
grants Atk+2.

If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Def+10
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%,
neutralizes status effects and disables skills
that prevent counterattacks during combat.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%,
neutralizes status effects and disables skills
that prevent counterattacks during combat.

Neutralizes status effects and disables skills
that prevent counterattacks during combat.

At start of turn, grants Atk/Spd+6 to adjacent
beast allies for 1 turn.

At start of turn, grants Def/Res+6 to adjacent
beast allies for 1 turn.

After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status
on target and foes within 1 space of target
restricting movement to 1 space through
their next actions.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants:
“If unit’s HP > 1 and foe would reduce unit’s
HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP. (Once per
combat. Does not stack.)”

Effective against dragon foes. If foe initiates
combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

Effective against dragon foes. Neutralizes foe's
bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.)
during combat, and disables foe's skills that
"calculate damage using the lower of foe's
Def or Res."
